markdownRemark.html:
What is the origin of an instrument’s life?
From the growth of its Maple tree material?
From the violin maker crafting its form?
From the musician giving its voice?

The violin remembers all emotional vibrations. The conscious back and forth bow movement, even the unconscious shaking hands during my first concert. The sounds of String vibration and Newtonian motion are carved into it's wood. The violin’s inner Space remembers all forms of vibrations in its Time.

People believe they are the lead soloist in their life’s symphony. But in the universe’s vast expanse of space and time, we are a fleeting spark. The violin lives longer than me. It should remember its own stories as the lead performer. I am just a partner playing a supporting role.

In the 16th century, Cremona Italy was the world capital of handcrafted violins. Each violin has its own printed “Certificato Di Authentica”. The violin’s unique fingerprint identity.

In the 21st century, Blocktag is a printed tag authentication technology. Each tag has its own unclonable fingerprint. When a violin is tagged, you can scan the tag with your phone camera and see the violin’s past life and its history for the centuries to come.

As time goes by, the violin’s life story can be recorded. For example, a partner musician’s performance recording at a concert hall. Generations of performers all the way back to the violin maker can be remembered this way.

https://app.blocktag.com/CNPFjZEG
This is the webpage linked to the tag inside my violin. The digital violin is the a 3D scan of the real violin, its digital twin. Blocktag is the eternal memory body of the violin.

The maker crafts it's form. The musician gives it life. Witness the evolution of each human generation.
